member.name: M:MeetBase.StringHelpers.Singularize(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to singularize the specified according to the rules of the English language.
member.param: If the number is greater than 1 or less than 1, the text is not singularized, otherwise, the text is singularized
member.returns: A string that consists of the text in its singularized form.

member.name: M:MeetBase.StringHelpers.Pluralize(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempts to pluralize the specified according to the rules of the English language.
member.remarks:
This function attempts to pluralize as many words as practical by following these rules:
Words that end with "y" (but not with a vowel preceding the y) are pluralized by replacing the "y" with "ies".
Words that end with "us", "ss", "x", "ch" or "sh" are pluralized by adding "es" to the end of the text.
Words that end with "f" or "fe" are pluralized by replacing the "f(e)" with "ves".
member.param: If number is 1, the text is not pluralized, otherwise, the text is pluralized.
member.returns: A string that consists of the text in its pluralized form.
